Class UnbrokenObjectInputStream 

   
    java.lang.Object

    org.codehaus.aspectwerkz.util.UnbrokenObjectInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable , DataInput , ObjectInput , ObjectStreamConstants 
     public class
     
      UnbrokenObjectInputStream
extends ObjectInputStream

Fixes the ObjectInputStream class, which does not always resolve the class correctly in complex class loader hierarchies.

Author:
Jonas BonŽr
